pkgmetadata.longdescription: Duration-Based Quantities of Interest for the Cox Proportional Hazards Model // Functions for generating, simulating, and visualizing expected durations and marginal changes in duration from the Cox proportional hazards model as described in Kropko and Harden (2017) doi:10.1017/S000712341700045X and Harden and Kropko (2018) doi:10.1017/psrm.2018.19.
